message.body: Hey dude. Any chance you would take a quick look at my water heater and give me your opinion before I pay someone to replace it?
Yeah I'm in class. Tomorrow ? Or late tonight
Thanks. Either one is fine whtv convenient for you.
In the morning would be better. I'm up really early so u tell me when
Any chance tmrw after 5pm works? I have to be into work earlier than normal around 830am ugh. Gonna be rushing out the door most likely.
Hey dude...around now if you're not busy
Tomorrow morning also good just couldn't do today early
